name: TEXTURE SS T-SHIRT-BLACK
description: Crafted from textured-knit cotton, this T-shirt offers a refined take on a wardrobe staple. Designed for a regular fit, it features ribbed detailing at the cuffs, collar, and hem. The ribbed crew neck is accented with yarn-dyed stripes, adding interest to your casual outfits. The look is finished with an embroidered GANT logo on the left chest for a signature touch.

name: Printed T-Shirt
description: Modern printed T-shirt

name: Oversized T-Shirt
description: Oversized fit trendy T-shirt

name: V-Neck T-Shirt
description: Classic V-neck T-shirt

name: Striped T-Shirt
description: Striped casual T-shirt

name: Sport T-Shirt
description: Breathable sport T-shirt

name: Long Sleeve T-Shirt
description: Long sleeve cotton T-shirt

name: GRAPHIC T-SHIRT-EVENING BLUE
description: Graphic design T-shirt

name: Cotton T-shirt Regular Fit
description: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Regular Fit.

name: SLIM CLASSIC POPLIN SHIRT-WHITE
description: Crafted in a durable poplin weave, this classic shirt is essential to any preppy wardrobe. Cut for a slim fit, it features a button-down collar, curved hem and an 80s-inspired GANT shield graphic embroidered at the chest.

name: Denim shirt
description: Shirt in denim with a collar and press-studs down the front. Patch chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, a V-shaped yoke at the back and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Gently rounded hem.

name: Loose Fit Flannel shirt
description: Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a sleeve placket, and a gently rounded hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

reviews.comment: Fit is too loose for me

name: Formal Black Shirt
description: Elegant black formal shirt

name: Linen-blend grandad shirt
description: Short-sleeved shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton and linen blend. Loose fit with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and an open chest pocket.

name: Slim Fit Shirt
description: Shirt in a cotton weave with a cut-away collar, classic front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Gently rounded hem. Slim fit that hugs the contours of your body, creating a fitted silhouette.

reviews.comment: A bit tight in the shoulders

name: Loose Fit Short-sleeved linen-blend shirt
description: Short-sleeved shirt in an airy linen and viscose blend with a turn-down collar, French front and a yoke at the back. Straight-cut hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

name: Regular Fit Oxford shirt
description: Shirt in Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Gently rounded hem. Regular fit for comfortable wear and a classic silhouette.

name: Regular Fit Patterned resort shirt
description: Short-sleeved shirt in an airy weave with a printed pattern. Resort collar, French front, and a straight-cut hem. Regular fit for comfortable wear and a classic silhouette.

name: Slim Fit Easy-iron shirt
description: Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, a classic front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Gently rounded hem. Slim fit that hugs the contours of your body, creating a fitted silhouette.

reviews.comment: Saves so much time on ironing

name: Relaxed Fit Knee-length piqué shorts
description: Knee-length shorts in cotton piqué with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Relaxed fit for a casual but not oversized silhouette.

reviews.comment: باس جيد ومريح للصيف، القطن ناعم
مقاس مريح جداً، مناسب للخروج اليومي

name: Relaxed Fit Poplin shorts
description: Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Relaxed fit for a casual but not oversized silhouette.

reviews.comment: شورت أنيق، مناسب للمناسبات غير الرسمية
الجودة ممتازة والقطن يناسب الطقس الحار

name: 2-pack DryMove™ mesh sports shorts
description: Sports shorts in DryMove™ functional fabric that helps to wick away moisture from your skin, keeping you comfortably dry while you move. Regular fit with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Pockets in the side seams and a slit at the hems for increased mobility.

reviews.comment: ممتاز للرياضة، يجف بسرعة ولا يحتفظ بالرطوبة
الشورتين في العرض واحد سعر جيد

name: Patterned swim shorts
description: Swim shorts in a patterned weave featuring covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Small slit at the hems. Soft mesh inner shorts.

name: Printed drawstring shortss
description: Loose-fit shorts in a soft, printed cotton weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring adorned with metal beads. Gathers at the top and discreet side pockets.

name: Cargo shorts
description: Knee-length cargo shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Elasticated waist with a drawstring, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and flap leg pockets.

reviews.comment: Practical cargo shorts with useful pockets.
Regular fit, but fabric quality could be better.
Good for outings and trips. Comfortable wear.

name: Cotton jersey shorts
description: Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and a small slit on one side of the hems.

reviews.comment: Super soft and comfortable for lounging at home.
Comfortable jersey material, good price point.
True to size, good quality fabric.

name: Double-layered sports shorts in DryMove™
description: Knee-length sports shorts in DryMove™ functional mesh that helps to wick away moisture from your skin, keeping you comfortably dry while you move. Regular fit with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a slit at the side of the hems. The shorts are layered over jersey cycling shorts with an open pocket on one leg.

reviews.comment: Perfect for intense workouts. Double layer is comfortable.
DryMove™ technology works well against sweat.
Best sports shorts I've ever bought!

name: Tailored shorts
description: Shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back. Pleats at the front and creases down the front and back.

reviews.comment: Very elegant, perfect for formal occasions.
Precise tailoring, fits the body well.

name: Wide High Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.

reviews.comment: Comfortable wide jeans with good denim quality.
Perfect wide high jeans, comfortable high waist.

name: Motif-detail wide leg jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in cotton denim with motifs details. Loose fit through the hip and thigh with wide legs. Adjustable elastication at the waist and a zip fly with a press-stud.

name: Skinny Fit Jeans
description: Jeans in washed denim with a skinny fit through the hip, thigh and leg. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

reviews.comment: Excellent skinny fit, hugs the body perfectly.

name: Feather Soft Denim drawstring trousers
description: Loose-fit trousers in supersoft and feather-light denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and wide legs.

name: Printed denim joggers
description: Joggers in printed cotton denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist with a cord stopper, a fake fly and fake front pockets. Legs with pleats at the knees for added width and covered elastication at the hems.

name: Wide Ultra High Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in rigid cotton denim that feels firm at first but then softens and loosens with wear. Wide leg with a regular fit from the waist to the hip and a wide cut from the thigh to the hem. Extra-high waist with a zip fly and button. Longer length, designed to fall over the foot with a stacking effect. Inspired by the 70s, designed for today.

reviews.comment: Very wide, reminds me of 70s fashion.
Extra high waist is very comfortable.
Good length, covers the feet completely.

name: Regular Tapered Jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.

reviews.comment: Perfect regular tapered fit, true to size.
Comfortable with stretch, good for movement.
Good quality, recycled cotton is a great idea.

name: Slim Fit Twill trousers
description: Ankle length trousers in a soft twill with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, pockets in the side seams and jetted back pockets. Legs with sewn-in creases and turn-ups at the hems. Slim fit that hugs the contours of your body, creating a fitted silhouette.

reviews.comment: Elegant slim fit, perfect for work.

name: Regular Fit Tailored linen-blend trousers
description: Trousers in an airy weave made from a lyocell and linen blend. Zip fly and an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-bar fastener and a button. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and long legs with creases. Regular fit for comfortable wear and a classic silhouette.

reviews.comment: Linen blend fabric, comfortable for summer.

name: Regular Fit Printed jeans
description: 5-pocket jeans in soft cotton denim with an all-over print. Regular fit through the hip and thigh with tapered legs. Adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.

reviews.comment: Comfortable regular fit, print is clear.

name: Loose Fit Printed hoodie
description: Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Lined hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

reviews.comment: Printed hoodie, loose fit is comfortable.
Kangaroo pocket is practical, fabric is soft.
Loose fit is comfortable, not too baggy.

name: Loose Fit Zip-through hoodie
description: Top in midweight sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Hood with a drawstring, zip down the front and front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

reviews.comment: Practical zip-through hoodie, easy to wear.

name: Oversized Fit Zip-through hoodie
description: Zip-through hoodie in heavyweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a zip down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Oversized fit for a baggy, extra-loose silhouette.

reviews.comment: A bit heavy for hot weather.

name: Relaxed Fit Hoodie
description: Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

name: Loose Fit Teddy zip-through hoodie
description: Top in soft teddy with a hood, zip down the front, and patch front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and elasticated binding at the cuffs and hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

reviews.comment: Very soft teddy fabric, feels luxurious.
Loose fit is comfortable, unique fabric.
Most beautiful hoodie in my collection.

name: DryMove™ Sleeveless sports hoodie
description: Sleeveless sports hoodie in DryMove™ functional fabric that helps to wick away moisture from your skin, keeping you comfortably dry while you move. Regular fit with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood and a straight-cut hem with a slit at each side.

reviews.comment: DryMove™ technology works effectively against sweat.

name: Loose Fit Sleeveless sports hoodie
description: Sleeveless sports hoodie in midweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look and a soft brushed inside. Loose fit with a lined, wrapover hood, a reflective print on the chest and back, a kangaroo pocket and a wide, ribbed trim at the hem.

name: Printed hoodie
description: Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside and a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with a lined, wrapover hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

reviews.comment: Price is high but quality justifies it.
